content: If you drive at an average speed of 50 miles per hour for 2.5 hours, how far will you travel?

If you drive at an average speed of 50 miles per hour for 2.5 hours, you can calculate the distance traveled using the formula:

Distance = Speed × Time

Plugging in the values:

Distance = 50 miles/hour × 2.5 hours = 125 miles

So, you will travel 125 miles.
